name: FunnelFLARE
author: JumpDEMAND Inc.

sections.description:
For those people who have an active FunnelFLARE account, this plugin will enable you to be notified when prospects are on your website.

FunnelFLARE is a sales process automation system that is designed to help you close deals faster by giving you better intelligence on how your prospects are engaging on your website.

Your Prospects Are On Your Website Right Now!!

What are you doing while your prospects are on your website? You should call them! With FunnelFLARE you can
– Receive notifications when your prospects visit your website
– Call your prospects directly from the browser notification
– View the timeline of everything your prospect did on your website

Turn Website Visitors Into Customers

FunnelFLARE is a sales process automation tool that combines
– Website intelligence
– Appointment scheduling
– Sales dialer
– Email sequence builder

in one easy to use product.

To learn more about the FunnelFLARE and to get your FunnelFLARE account, go to FunnelFLARE.

Privacy

FunnelFLARE takes website privacy seriously. Read about FunnelFLARE’s Privacy Policy.

GDPR

FunnelFLARE provides an extensive GDPR data policy and helps you with compliance. FunnelFLARE GDPR Addendum
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin from within the Dashboard or upload the directory FunnelFLARE and all its contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: The easy way to integrate FunnelFLARE with your website.
